text: 4.12: Sng 109.28; Mt 5.44; FG 18.3; 1 Ko 9.14-15; 1 Te 2.9; 2 Te 3.8; 1 T 4.10Nza guigira wari won farira ŋaara mbatɨga mbui. Mbe nza nzɨɨv nza nzuaim, nza mbe nzuai fhu, nza tɨvar vhuun mben muun zav, mbe nzuav Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuai. Mbe tɨva mbatɨgar nza mbui, nza fhura wari wo thɨɨri pɨngiap mba simtɨgi ndi.
